title: FS: NEW Lot of Polar Bear T205 **ALL SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Lot of Polar Bear T205 **ALL SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale or trade. These are mostly nicer mid-grade cards as the scans will show. Even the lower grade cards in the group have nice eye appeal for the technical grade. Only a few beaters in this lot! 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

**ALL CARDS SOLD.  THANKS FOR LOOKING**
Does it have the no quotes or is there the partial quote on the right side?

[quote name="T205 GB" post=1596712]Does it have the no quotes or is there the partial quote on the right side?[/QUOTE]

I didn't see this message until after it had already sold, but wanted to reply just for informational purposes.  Under magnification, you can see a single tiny dot to the right of the "c" but there are several dots of the typical Polar Bear tobacco staining in that area also, so it's very difficult to tell whether it is the faint remnant of a print dot or some other type of staining.  Either way, it's extremely difficult to see with the naked eye.  Thanks for the interest!
Cards received, thanks marc. As usual a pleasure to deal with:D
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
